ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard seeks advice...
ygData.msgSnippet: I would keep the Song Analysis right where it is. -Sing ... __________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Send instant messages & get email
ygData.messageBody:
I would keep the Song Analysis right where it is.

-Sing


--- "Reeves, Patrick W" <pwr3@...> wrote:
> I received an email last night from Manga of the
> EverQuest Stratics site.
> They are interested in hosting the Song Analysis on
> their network. I
> consider the Song Analysis to be not just mine, but
> all of yours as well. As
> it would not be what it is without the combined
> wisdom of all the wonderful
> bards on this mailing list and on the Concert Hall
> message board. Your
> opinions on this matter mean a lot to me, so please
> let me know what your
> feelings are.
>
> -------------------------------------------------
> Ro-kenn Swiftsong - Karana server
> 51st lvl Wood Elf Minstrel
>
> EQ Bard Song Analysis
> http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/
>
